title: Taiga
description: Earth is covered with several distinct biomes. Taiga introduces students to the planet's largest land biome through vivid photographs and detailed information. Students will learn about the different features of this biome including its climate and wildlife, as well as the people who call the taiga home. This book can also be used to teach students how to identify the main idea and supporting details.
